Allow a selection of soothing content to relax your mood. Tea Time Relaxation can turn your screen on at %1$s and turn it off at %2$s. Content is changed automatically every %3$s. Set the time schedule and interval via the %4$s app.

End of Service Announcement for Samsung Checkout mobile app

Dear Samsung Checkout mobile app users, 

Thank you for using Samsung Checkout mobile app.
Unfortunately, Samsung Checkout mobile app will no longer be supported from Dec. 16, 2020[GMT]
Even after mobile app service ends, you can still purchase content or redeem your coupon via Samsung Checkout on TV and check the purchase history or manage payment methods at www.samsungcheckout.com
For any questions or help, please contact us at checkout.cs@samsung.com

All the best,
Samsung Checkout team

Automatically adjusts your Screen Picture Quality menu to enable the best display performance and produce accurate picture quality based on International Standards.
To calibrate the camera manually, you need the measure data using a professional color meter.
Calibration may not be accurate in this environment.
Set your mobile camera manually based on the result measured by your professional color meter.
Setup the color meter in the middle of the display, then follow the guide below.
Then, connect the mobile with the display and select the Measure button below when you\'re ready.
Compare the quality difference of the previous image with the best picture on the TV.
Detecting is in progress. Please wait.
Enable HDR calibration to apply additional settings (duration time will be increased).
An intensive calibration for 20-point white balance, grayscale linearity, gamma and chromaticity.
Do not move the mobile device during calibration.
Picture quality adjustment has been completed.
The selected picture mode has been applied.
Wait until the measurement is complete...
A simple calibration feature to provide a consistent white balance on your screen.
A simple calibration for white balance and picture menu optimization.
Place the rear camera of your mobile device 1-3 cm from the white rectangle area on the display device screen and select Start.
If you are ready, press the button below to start the next step.
A tripod is recommended for Professional Mode, which takes around 7-15 minutes or more.
%1$s will measure and adjust the color balance of your display device. For best results, a dark environment is recommended.

1. To turn on Sound Mirroring go to Settings > Art Mode > Sound Mirroring.
Note: This will disconnect all of The Frame\'s other Bluetooth connections.
2. Turn on Bluetooth in your mobile device\'s settings.
3. Find your Samsung Frame on your mobile\'s device list and select. Confirm the connection on your mobile pop-up and, if prompted, confirm the connection on The Frame by selecting the Allow button.
4. Open a music app on your mobile device and play!
